org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2

Interface IMessageBroker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageBroker

    public interface IMessageBroker
    The IEventBroker interface defines methods for receiving and publishing messages from and to any given topic. It also provides methods for managing topics and topic subscriptions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<IMessage<?>> getMessages(java.lang.String topicName, ITransformationStep step)
      Returns messages sent to the transformation step subscription.
      void removeMessage(java.lang.String topicName, ITransformationStep step, IMessage<?> message)
      Removes the message from the queue of the specified subscription.
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String topicName, IMessage<?> message)
      Send the specified message to the topic whose name is matching the @param topicName parameter.
      void subscribeTo(java.lang.String topicName, ITransformationStep step)
      Subscribes the given transformation step to the Topic whose name matches the @param topicName parameter.
